ygData.subject: RE: Question on Safe Fall (was: Re: List of skill caps. )
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s capped at 40 from the start, and you don t really need to practice it as long as you re running across terrain where you used to take moderate damage
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 29 Sep 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> I built my safe fall skill by taking small damage jumps off the side of the
> fire tower in Lake Rathe between spawns. Jump of for 40 dmg - half a dozen
> times then see skill has improved msg. Jump off for 50 dmg, half a dozen
> times - see skill msg, jump off for 60 dmg never see skill msg - guess it
> must be capped for me at that level (lo 20's).

It's capped at 40 from the start, and you don't really need to
practice it as long as you're running across terrain where you
used to take moderate damage (Ro, Oasis, parts of
Butcherblock, etc). You'll gain the skill naturally just
running around these zones. You do not have to take damage to
gain skill.

I still think this cap needs to be raised at higher levels.
Oasis and North Ro can be deadly to me now if I try to run in
a straight line across the desert.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
